message.body:
My dearest Lydia, You are cordially invited to attend our night of festivities at our second annual Halloween Ball. Come attired in appropriate costume. The event is supply your own spirits and drink, but prepare to inbibe of our brew that will be available. Most of all, come ready to engage in conversation with the other patrons of the night. Come and celebrate the macabre with us!
Date: Saturday, Nov 1st
As if you could stop me from showing up!
Lmbo! Well dang next time just be straight forward Ahahaha
I'm coming dressed up as Honey Boo Boo!
I presume you'll give me the address closer to the date, correct?
Yea I can give it to you now but 9x out of 10 everyone asks for it again.... pizza, buffalo chicken dip, chips & pretzels
And if anyone wants to bring a dish, of course they can do so and some did last year
